title: Looking for New Flex Club member (한국인오던가)
body:
Condition to Entry
1. Flex 5v5 Rank (Plat-Dia)
2. Win Rate (60%-100%)
3. At least 2-4 times for a week Needs to play more than 3hours with team mates
4. Someone who try hard to WIN
5. At least One main position(if you can play any position choose 2 positions which is more better)
6. Know how to use Discord

 Favorable condition 
1.  Korean background or Korean continues speaker 
2. Skilled at meta and non meta off picks
3. Strong mental 

This club is based on Flex 5v5 Rank.
Most of players are Korean but we loved to have other nationality.
When you join our club we will practice 5v5 on custom and play Flex 5v5 Rank


If you are interested add "Flysya" on League OR add "kojo1301"  on KaKao Talk

replies.body:
IGN: master namer
Flex rank: p2
Flex winrate: 57% (13W:10L)

Even though its not very impressive winrate ive only played flex solo, and lost my last 5 games cause i played at 4-5am and got matched vs challengers/master (soloq rank).

Diamond I Flex Queue (was Challenger last week but decayed) 63% win rate (73W-43L)
Diamond III Solo Queue
I only play on weekends now. I can play if you guys desperately need a fifth member.
My teams have mostly come from silver to platinum. So it's almost Platinum. Are you okay?

Hi, i am looking to improve my skills and would like to practice with you in your custom games. I am unraked and look to improve before i try it. Even though i might end up not being good enough could i try out?
Add Trankil
Sorry our club exists for flex and we have to be at least a platinum to flex with us.
